0P0000UF6F.TO.summary: The Fundâs investment objectives are to generate monthly income and to maximize total return by investing primarily in a portfolio of banking issuers, other financial issuers and real estate related companies and/or real estate investment trusts (âREITsâ) listed on a recognized stock exchange in North America.
0P0000UF6F.TO.manager_bio: Paul Gardner, CFA is a principal, and portfolio manager for the equity and fixed income portfolios at Avenue Investment Management. He has more than 18 years experience in the investment industry. Prior to co-founding Avenue Investment Management, he was at TD Asset Management. Mr. Gardner received his B.A. from York University in 1986. He became a Chartered Financial Analyst in 1991. He is a member of the Toronto Society of Financial Analysts and A.I.M.R.
